thread.title: Open Hospitality Goes On Sale For Royal TroonTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Open Hospitality Goes On Sale For Royal TroonTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Open Hospitality Goes On Sale For Royal TroonTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Open Hospitality Goes On Sale For Royal Troon  
Hospitality packages that sold out during The Open at St Andrews this year have gone on sale for the 145TH Open next year at Royal Troon (10-17 July 2016) at early season prices.
 
Over 8,400 hospitality inclusive packages were sold across practice and Championship days at St Andrews through The Open Hospitality Programme, the only on-course provider.
 
The Open Hospitality Programme sales director, Brett Tonkyn said: “The Open is a unique event in the British sporting calendar and in a full day out there is ample opportunity to enjoy world class sport in a business friendly environment”.
 
“Hospitality at The Open can be tailored to meet individual requirements and Major Championship golf has a proven track record in helping businesses large and small to strengthen key customer relationships”.
 
Early season inclusive hospitality pricing extends to 31 January 2016. It includes a final practice day package at £199 per person and Championship day packages ranging from £325 to £499 per person (quoted prices exclude VAT).
 
Source:- IAGTO
